Name: Laranga
About the game: Laranga is a life simulator with adventure elements. The action takes place on an isolated island. The leisurely pace of the game allows you to create biological interconnected communities and observe their development and evolution, simultaneously completing different tasks and struggling with emerging difficulties. Available 5 locations and more than 16 species of creatures.
